body_html:
@shuangwu Ok, I'm seeing this too now actually. It's coming from the LabelImage.java example, which is not part of the Java API itself.

If you replace java.srcDirs with this I think it will work:

            java {
                srcDir '../../java/src/main/java'
                exclude '**/examples/**'
            }
            java {
                srcDir '../../contrib/android/java'
            }
            java {
                srcDir 'src'
            }
